description.en: ConcertVR will be the first blockchain based marketplace for high-quality VR content from the music and entertainment sector. Enjoy real concerts in Virtual Reality - in realtime or on demand - right from the comfort of your own home! Besides all well established payment methods, we accept a multitude of crypto currencies
